title: The City Uncovered - s01e02 - BBC (21st January 2009)
description:
The City Uncovered - s01e02 - Tricks With Risk

What: Documentary
Where: BBC 2
When: 21st January 2009
Duration: 1 hour
Technical info: 716 MB XviD
Other: 2 of 3 parts


In the second of his series of documentaries on modern finance, Evan Davis heads into the world of the City's risk professionals - the derivatives whizzkids, and hedge fund managers. Their toolkit of tricks mean they can and do make billions, yet they're often viewed with suspicion, and labelled the bad boys. In this program, Evan Davis meets the men behind the myths.
